forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 51. West southwest wind around 3 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 65. West wind 3 to 12 mph.

weather_report:
In the gentle embrace of early morning, Downtown San Francisco awakens under a quilt of parting clouds, poised to transition from night to day. The lingering coolness wraps around you, hinting at the night's low of around fifty-one degrees, while a soft west southwest breeze at just a whisper's strength adds a refreshing touch. As the city readies itself for the sun’s ascent, you may notice a fleeting veil of marine layer gently clinging to the coast, a fleeting memory of the ocean’s breath.

As the sun rises higher, expect the skies to open up with a burst of clarity. The day promises to unfurl into a mostly sunny canvas, bright and inviting with a peak temperature around sixty-five degrees. Dressing in layers will be key; a light sweater or jacket will be perfect for the fresh morning air, while a t-shirt or light top can be revealed as the warmth settles in. Consider meandering through the winding streets, perhaps stopping for a quiet coffee at a local café, or taking a stroll along the Embarcadero to soak in the picturesque views of the bay, accompanied by the faint sound of water lapping against the docks. Given the gentle charm of this day, it’s an ideal time to relish both the tranquility of the early hours and the vibrant energy that San Francisco exudes as it awakens.
